name: PAT_ENC_MSP
description: This table contains the Medicare Secondary Payor Information from the Patient (EPT) master file. The encounters with MSP information are the only ones extracted into this table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SUPPLIED_BY
columns.description: The name of the person who supplied the information for the Medicare Secondary Payor questionnaire (MSPQ).

columns.name: RELATION_PAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the relationship to the patient of the person who supplied the information for the MSPQ.

columns.name: PAT_RETIRE_DATE
columns.description: The date of retirement for the patient.

columns.name: MSP_USER
columns.description: The name of the user who last accessed the Medicare Secondary Payor Questionnaire (MSPQ) for this contact.

columns.name: LAST_ACCESS_DATE
columns.description: The date and time that the Medicare Secondary Payor Questionnaire (MSPQ) for this contact was last accessed.

columns.name: NA_HEALTH_BEN_YN_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is eligible for Native American healthcare benefits. Y indicates that the patient is eligible for Native American healthcare benefits. N indicates that the patient is not eligible for Native American healthcare benefits. A null value indicates this item was not filled out.

columns.name: NA_RESERVATION_C_NAME
columns.description: The Native American reservation category ID for the Medicare Secondary Payor questionnaire (MSPQ).

columns.name: IS_ACCIDENT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has been in an accident.

columns.name: IS_CVG_VET_BEN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the Department of Veterans Affairs (DVA) authorized and agreed to pay for care at this facility or the patient would like the DVA to be contacted for such authorization.

columns.name: IS_OVER_100_EMP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient's Group Health Plan (GHP) is sponsored by an employer with 100 or more employees.

columns.name: IS_NON_ERSD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is entitled to Medicare because of disability other than End Stage Renal Disease.

columns.name: IS_BLACK_LUNG_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is entitled to benefits under the Black Lung Program.

columns.name: IS_CVD_EGHP_C_NAME
columns.description: If the patient has employer group health plan (EGHP) coverage based on own or family member's current or former employment.
entries: Yes, covered by current employer's EGHP
Yes, covered by a former employer's EGHP

columns.name: IS_END_STAGE_RNL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is entitled to Medicare because of End Stage Renal Disease.

columns.name: IS_NONWORK_ACC_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the illness or injury is the result of a non work-related accident.

columns.name: IS_WORKERS_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the illness or injury is covered by workers' compensation.

columns.name: IS_OTHER_EMPLYD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the spouse or other family member is currently employed.
entries: Yes, but Retired from Previous Employment

columns.name: IS_PAT_EMPLYD_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is currently employed.
entries: Yes, but Retired from Previous Employment

columns.name: IS_PAT_SPSE_RET_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient or spouse is retired.

columns.name: IS_PHS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the services are covered by a Public Health Service or Research Program.

columns.name: IS_VET_BEN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether patient is entitled to benefits under the Department of Veterans Affairs.

columns.name: IS_OVER_20_EMP_C
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient's Group Health Plan (GHP) is sponsored by an employer with 20 or more employees.

columns.name: MSP_COMPLTN_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who last completed the Medicare Secondary Payor Questionnaire (MSPQ) for this contact.

columns.name: MSP_COMPLTN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: MSP_COMPLETE_DATE
columns.description: The date when the Medicare Secondary Payor Questionnaire (MSPQ) was last opened and completed.

columns.name: MSP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The Completion Status category number for the Medicare Secondary Payor Questionnaire (MSPQ).

columns.name: IS_AGE_ENTITLED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is entitled to benefits based on age.

columns.name: IS_PRVSN_APPLY_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is entitled to benefits based on the working aged or disability provision.

columns.name: IS_DUAL_ENTITLED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is entitled to Medicare based on a combination of either ESRD and age, or ESRD and disability.
